dict.string: Create a calculation which is the same as {$x} + {$y}. Make the numbers in the bracket as small as possible.

array.string: <b:t>Create a calculation which is the same as {$x} + {$y}. Make the numbers in the bracket as small as possible.</b:t>
<b:on number="1"/> <b:on number="2" /> <b:on number="3" /> <b:on number="4" /> <b:on number="5" /> <b:on number="6" /> <b:on number="7" /> <b:on number="8" /> <b:on number="9" /> <b:on number="10" />
<b:on number="5" enabled="no"/> <b:t>(</b:t> <b:on number="{$x/5}" enabled="no"/> <b:oo value="+" /> <b:on number="{$y/5}" enabled="no"/> <b:t>)</b:t> <b:oo value="=" /> <b:t>{$x} + {$y}</b:t>
